mapper.select: SELECT i.image_original_file1, m.member_id, m.member_nickname, m.member_name, m.member_phone, a.address_zipcode, a.address1, a.address2 FROM member m LEFT JOIN address a ON a.address_idx = m.member_idx LEFT JOIN image i ON m.member_idx = i.member_idx WHERE member_id=#{member_id}

SELECT i.image_original_file1, p.product_name, p.product_sell_price, o.order_sell_date, o.order_sell_gb FROM product p LEFT JOIN image i ON i.member_idx = p.product_idx LEFT JOIN order_sell o ON p.product_idx = o.order_sell_idx WHERE member_id=#{member_id}
